entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and has a large size, which makes it difficult for him to fly on a broomstick. He has also had a ride on an Abraxan horse.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who is trying to get information from Hagrid about his whereabouts.

relationships.description: Hagrid is being questioned by Umbridge about his whereabouts during the past two months.
Although not explicitly stated, it can be inferred that Hagrid is trying to defend himself against Umbridge's accusations and questions.
